item.description:
Good Evening Coffee Talkers,

This is a revision to the original Event RSVP.

If you cannot make it to the Spring Show, then
The October Show is much more popular with
More attractions.


Spring 08 Chiller Theater Expo

www.chillertheatre.com/main.htm

http://www.chillerthe...

Look at the link for the event details;

My SUV is already full.
A few of us will Meet Up in West Haven on route.
I will be contacting those going with me for the time
and place this weekend.
I usually stop at McDonalds in Milford for coffee before
Getting on to the Park Way.
If a co-worker of mine is also going, then I will meet him at the
Circuit City by the Trumbull Mall.

We will be driving to
Chiller Theatre Toy, Model and Film Extravaganza
Hilton Hotel
Parsippany, New Jersey, 07054

Directions can be found on the link.

I do go a different way so that my Directions will be;
From West Haven I 95 to Exit 38 veer left towards
The Merritt Parkway that later becomes the
Hutchinson River Parkway to Exit 26 West on to
I 287 West and I 87. Take exit 15 to get off I 87
To stay on I 287.
(FYI Exit 55 has a Wendys
and other restaurants if you need a break.)
Exit 39B to Rte 10 W towards Dover.
Exit on to Dryden Way.
Left on Campus Drive.
Left on Hilton Ct.
You can Park in the Building Complex on the Left.
Short Walk to the Hilton Hotel beyond the Pond on the
Right.

To answer the question of what is Chiller Con.
Chiiller Con has a few things happening at once, various vendors are selling their products
such as
DVDs or Model Figurines or Magazines or Autographed Photos, etc. Newer Genre or B Movie
Stars are there to promote their most recent genre movies.
Older stars come out of their retirement to meet their fans.
Wrestlers and other kinds of entertainers also come out to meet their fans.

There is a full listing of Guests on line right now.

http://www.chillerthe...

www.chillertheatre.com/gt/gtc4.htm

It is too late to order tickets. You will have to get tickets at the door.

It is usually lots of fun.

Remember to bring your cameras.
A listing of stars / guests will also come in handy.
There might be long lines to get some autographs.


Mike B

Assistant Organizer

Coffee Talk
item.how_to_find_us: My SUV is full. Some of us will meet in West Haven and another will meet in Trumbull. If anyone else is going, then you have to arraign for your own car pooling.
item.why: Instead of seeing movie actors and actresses on the screen, do you want to meet them in person?
item.name: Spring 08 Chiller Theater Expo - 5/4
